This is a testharness.js-based test.
[FAIL] select should support :open pseudo selector.
  assert_true: This test requires appearance:base-select in order to run. expected true got false
[FAIL] select :open and :not(:open) should invalidate correctly.
  assert_true: This test requires appearance:base-select in order to run. expected true got false
Harness: the test ran to completion.
